content: for the middle front/beginning of round k60 64 place marker for middle back k60 64 to beginning of round decrease round k1 k2tog knit to within 3sts of marker ssk k1 repeat across round knit 5 rounds repeat the last 6 rounds 5 7 more times 96sts repeat decrease round 92sts next round k10 p26 10 repeat across round next round knit next round k10 p26 k10 repeat across round next round knit next round k10 p26 k10 repeat across round next round k1 k2tog k12 13 bo16 14 with one stitch remaining on left needle k11 12 ssk k2 k2tog k12 13 put these 28 30 back stitches on holder to be worked lastly bo16 14 with 1 stitch remaining on left needle k11 12 ssk knit to end there are 28 30sts for bib bib ws row s1 k3 3 3 4 5 p16 16 16 18 18 k4 4 4 5 6 rs row s1 knit to end repeat these two row 7 7 8 9 10 more times ending with a rs row next row ws s1 knit to end next row rs s1 k3 yo k2tog k12 12 12 16 18 k2tog yo k4 these buttonholes can be replaced by one-row buttonhole technique next row ws s1 knit to end next row rs s1 knit to end next row ws s1 knit to end next row rs bobble bib back for sizes 0-6mos 6-12mos 12-18mos only ws attach yarn k4 p16 k4 rs s1 k8 ssk k2 k2tog k9 ws s1 k3 p14 k4 rs s1 k3 k2tog k10 ssk k4 ws s1 k3 p12 k4 rs s1 k6 ssk k2 k2tog k7 ws s1 k3 p10 k4 rs s1 k3 k2tog k6 ssk k4 ws s1 k3 p8 k4 rs s1 k4 ssk k2 k2tog k5 ws s1 k3 p6 k4 rs s1 k3 k2tog k2 ssk k4 ws s1 k3 p4 k4 rs s1 k3 ssk k2tog k4 ws s1 k9 rs s1 k9 ws s1 k9 rs s1 k9 ws switch to 4mm straights s1 k9 back for 2t & 3t only ws attach yarn k5 6 p18 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog k14 ssk k5 6 ws s1 k4 5 p16 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog k12 ssk k5 6 ws s1 k4 5 p14 k5 6 rs s1 k8 9 ssk k2 k2tog k9 10 ws s1 k4 5 p12 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog k8 ssk k5 6 ws s1 k4 5 p10 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog k6 ssk k5 6 ws s1 k4 5 p8 k5 6 rs s1 k5 6 ssk k2 k2tog k6 7 ws s1 k4 5 p6 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog k2 ssk k5 6 ws s1 k4 5 p4 k5 6 rs s1 k4 5 k2tog ssk k5 6 ws s1 k to end rs s1 k to end ws s1 k to end rs s1 k to end ws switch
